meanings.definition: To enjoy oneself in a luxurious way.
meanings.sent1: She luxuriates in a warm bubble bath every evening.
meanings.sent2: The cat luxuriates in the sunbeam streaming through the window.
meanings.sent3: The puppy luxuriates in rolling around on the soft grass.
meanings.sent4: The flower luxuriates in the rich soil, blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The child luxuriates in the feeling of sand between their toes at the beach.

meanings.definition: To take great pleasure or delight in something.
meanings.sent1: He luxuriates in the taste of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent2: The audience luxuriates in the music of the talented pianist.
meanings.sent3: The student luxuriates in solving a challenging math problem.
meanings.sent4: The artist luxuriates in the vibrant colors of their painting.
meanings.sent5: The family luxuriates in the laughter shared during dinner together.

meanings.definition: To indulge in luxury or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: They luxuriate in a weekend getaway at a fancy resort.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy businessman luxuriates in expensive cars and watches.
meanings.sent3: The foodie luxuriates in trying new and exotic dishes.
meanings.sent4: The queen luxuriates in the opulence of her palace.
meanings.sent5: The couple luxuriates in the romantic atmosphere of a candlelit dinner.
